message.content:
{"id": "124599", "title": "Bug 124599Shortcut delete and menu delete act different in table column.", "description": "Description: Shortcut delete and menu delete act differently in table columns.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the attached file from bug 124598, which contains a table with a list/grid nested in its group header and a merge in the group header row.
2. Select the second column in the table.
3. Press the delete key on your keyboard.

OB: Both shortcut delete and menu delete should have the same behavior.
EB: In step 2, the whole grid in the group header is deleted.
SR: To reproduce the issue, open the attached file mentioned in bug 124598 and follow the steps provided."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>

', 'SR': 'Open attached file in bug 124598, in the file, the second table has a list/grid nest in its group header and a merge in group header row.2. Select the second column, press delete in your keyboard3. '}
